titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on amino sulfon br.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/27/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1990, the duty on 3-(4 aminobenzamido) phenyl-beta-hydroxyethyl sulfone (also known as amino sulfon br).
